post.text: "Hillary will be a president our kids can look up to, a president who believes in our kids and will fight for them every day." â€”First Lady Michelle Obama

comment.author: Caitlin
comment.text: your daughters will always be known as deplorable, xenophobes, islamaphobes, bigots, racist, sexist, homophobic, basement dwellers. my 2 millennials, one who is a basement dweller fresh out of college had to look a few of those words up for the meaning...I'll tell you what message that gave my millennials!!!

replies.author: Tanner
replies.text: And maybe Trump can date them some day--maybe even sexually assault them while you look the other way....
